text.section: The General Assembly desires that, during preparation of a proposed budget, the Governor review, thoroughly and in detail, the recommendations of the Spending Affordability Committee.

To have the complete financial program of the Governor early in a regular session, the General Assembly desires that the Governor:
submit with the proposed budget for a fiscal year:
the Governor's complete financial program for that fiscal year; and
each bond or revenue bill proposed to carry out the program; and
use a supplemental budget amendment only to:
correct a mechanical error in the proposed budget; or
provide funding for legislation enacted during the session.
